price: Ndio hivi! Basi na wayaonje maji ya moto na ya usaha!
footnotes: Haya maji ya moto, mwisho wa umoto, na usaha wa watu wa Jahannamu wataamrishwa wayaonje.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
